text: British American Racing was a Formula One constructor that competed in the sport from 1999 to 2005. BAR began by acquiring Tyrrell, and used Supertec engines for their first year. Subsequently they formed a partnership with Honda which lasted for the next six years. ==Complete Formula One results== (key) (results in bold indicate pole position) Year Chassis Engine Tyres Drivers
